rows.name: question_session_id
rows.value: Which session are you reporting on?

rows.name: question_session_time
rows.value: How much time did you spend facilitating your parent WhatsApp group over the last week?

rows.name: question_participants
rows.value: Which of the parents in your group participated?

rows.name: participants_definition
rows.value: Participation is defined as any parent who posts a comment, question, reply or reaction (such as a thumbs up) within the chat since you shared the first message from the weekly discussion.
